sources.title: Genetics: A Tool to Improve Bull Trout Sustainability - Hydro Review
sources.snippet: Three hydroelectric projects on the Clark Fork River in Montana and Idaho block upstream migration of bull trout, a threatened species. Avista Corporation, which owns two of these projects, uses genetic analysis of fin tissues from bull trout collected below the most downstream dam to determine each fish's region of origin.
